Caption: Figure 1: The ten views of Jigsaw used in this study. (Top row) Document, List, Document Cluster, Graph, Document Grid; (Bottom row) Cal- endar, Timeline, WordTree, Scatterplot, Circular Graph. Figures are captured from (http://www.cc.gatech.edu/gvu/ii/jigsaw/views.html).

Table 1: Difficulty ratings on the ten views of Jigsaw. The ratings were collected from 5-level Likert scale in the introduction session (1: Easy to use, self-explanatory, 2: Clear, possible to use, 3: Somewhat clear, hard to use, 4: Not clear, hard to use, and 5: To- tally incomprehensible). The rows are ordered by the average diffi- culty rating.
Figure 2: P5 mistakenly thought there was a line between two enti- ties (top). P6 could not see clearly which entities are connected with which entities because of clutter in the List View (bottom).
